abstract: Trial of alleged former Al Qaeda operative Khalid al-Fawwaz begins in Manhattan; Fawwaz is accused of helping plan deadly bombings of United States embassies in Nairobi and Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, in 1998.
lead_paragraph: Khaled al-Fawwaz, charged in the attacks in Kenya and Tanzania, is one of the earliest and most senior alleged members of Al Qaeda to be tried in the United States.
snippet: Khaled al-Fawwaz, charged in the attacks in Kenya and Tanzania, is one of the earliest and most senior alleged members of Al Qaeda to be tried in the United States.

headline.main: Third Trial in 1998 U.S. Embassy Bombings in Africa Begins
headline.print_headline: Third Trial in 1998 U.S. Embassy Bombings in Africa Begins
